EmailTemplate.name: PROMO Goods Dealer Request
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
YETI has experienced unprecedented growth since its inception. YETI's ever-growing popularity is outpacing our manufacturing facilities capacity and is currently unable to deliver enough good to meet our demands.
Due to these constraints YETI has paused the distribution of our products into the Corporate, Premium and Promotional Products channel. We may reconsider re-entering into this marketplace in the future but not until we are able to provide our distribution partners the necessary product availability to be successful
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
